ifpri %>% 
  filter(str_detect(var, "b_|k_|f_01_|f_05_|j_01|j_07|j_08|l2_|k_|e_01|e_03|e_05|e_06|e_07|n_")) %>% 
  replace_na(list(value = 0)) %>% 
  select(hhid, var, value) %>% 
  pivot_wider(-hhid, names_from = var, values_from = value)
